title: Commentary on Jordan Peterson Biblical series 4b Deconstructing Critics of Xianity
description:
Why are people who listen to Peterson interested in the Bible and Christianity? Part of the reason is that he's deconstructing facile critics of the Bible and religion like Freud and Marx. 

Going old school with the Biblical Series Commentary. This time on Bib Ser 4 https://youtu.be/Ifi5KkXig3s 

No fancy this time, just watching through and commenting on what I've learned so far from Peterson.
